mapper.select: SELECT u.id AS userId, u.`user_name` AS userName, u.`true_name` AS trueName, u.`introduction`, u.`fans_count` AS fansCount, u.`follow_count` AS followCount, u.`portrait_url` AS portraitUrl, u.sex FROM follow f JOIN USER u ON f.`user_id_follow` = u.id WHERE f.`user_id` = #{userId} and f.status = 0
